Html: I just got an email from Microsoft stating that after a system check they found that the XrmSvcToolkit is unsupported. Is there going to be an update for CRM Online 2013

Hey Philip,

thanks for letting us know. Email should have contained an attachment containing details about the incompatibilities. Can you please send us the relevant part of that attachment?

Thanks again
George

Received a message from Microsoft; here is the file: http://pastebin.com/zptwjkKr

Let me know if I can assist. I'm on CRM 2011 Online, but I have an instance on 2013 as well.

Great, Philip, thanks for sending this through.

Scanner picked only on IsOutlookClient() call which is just a single line in the code and will be easily replaced before the 2013 release.
Interestingly that scanner did not pick on getServerUrl which is deprecated and should be replaced with getClientUrl.

In any case, we'll fix those very soon.
Any news on when we can get an update for 2013?

I will get into this sometime this week.

Thanks!
I tried to run Legacy Feature Check Tool, and it didn't report this as an issue, not sure what tool Microsoft is using to scan the code.
